CustomLayoutPanel.onload: AsyncEvent( 2, RemoveStyle( Model_FG, Initialize ) ); AsyncEvent( 3, AddStyle( Title, Initialize ) );

Panel.onmouseover: DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, light_fairy, IntensityOverTime, '5 0.1' ); DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, sylph_particle, start, 1 );
Panel.onmouseout: DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, light_fairy, IntensityOverTime, '0 0.2' ); DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, sylph_particle, stop);

Panel.onmouseover: DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, light_armadillo, IntensityOverTime, '4 0.1' ); DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, donte_particle, start, 1 );
Panel.onmouseout: DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, light_armadillo, IntensityOverTime, '0 0.2' ); DOTAGlobalSceneFireEntityInput( Model_FG, donte_particle, stop);
